Class DatabaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ssau.DAO.DatabaseUtils

  • @Repository
public class DatabaseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    My own mind on databases ( just because I'm little dumb to connect normal MySQL database to server ) All entities converts to JSON in storage
